title.value: Improvement of the distribution system in agro-food sector. Theory, methodology, practice
Совершенствование системы сбыта в агропродовольственной сфере. Теория, методология, практика

organization.name: Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

person.name: Gusakov, V.G., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Presidium
Ganush, G.I., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

abstract.value: The results of the study aimed on the research of theory, methodology and practice of improving the marketing system in the agro-food sector of the Republic of Belarus are presented in the book. Problems of agricultural development and main directions to solve them are enumerated; theoretical and methodological foundations of the production and marketing system are substantiated. The most important directions of the organization and improvement of the efficiency and functioning of international marketing are outlined. International experience of the formation of trade and marketing policy in the process of realization of agricultural products is evaluated and analyzed. The most important directions of the formation of national marketing system along with improvement of distribution network are suggested.
